author: Jorge Solis
title: Even Apes Know How Important Handwashing Is, And This Young Orangutan Is Proof
description: Learn what it takes to get a good grade at the Orangutan Jungle School.
content: The Smithsonian Channel has released an adorable and informative clip from their educational docuseries, Orangutan Jungle School. Watch as a young and earnest orangutan applies her classroom lesson and happily practices teaching herself how to wash her hands.… [+2234 chars]
